text: María José Pinto González-Artigas (born 29 January 1986) is an Ecuadorian businesswoman and politician, who has been the 54th Vice President of Ecuador since 2025. She won the 2025 election as the running mate of President Daniel Noboa. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Ecuadorian businesspeople Category:Politicians from Quito Category:1986 births Category:Vice Presidents of Ecuador
title: María José Pinto
